content:
Malpaanmaaraayu vishvaasam samsthhaapichu
Parishuddhaathmaavin koottaallikallaay, dustharkkam
Paade bhedicha-kaisariyaayin-besilum
Greegoriyosum-vijnyan thevologosum
Atthaanaasyosum-peedithanaam deeyaskorosu
Sathyam snehichor-seveere peelakseenosu
Malpaanapremum-yaakkobee sathyapithaakkall
Elpichittulllla-vishvaasatthe shuddhasabha
Ghoshicheedunnu-thal praarththhana nyangallkkabhayam.
